price: To ĩmaninsu bai kasance yanã amfaninsu ba a lõkacin da suka ga azãbarMu. Hanyar Allah wadda ta gabãta a cikin bãyin Sa. Kuma kãfirai sun yi hasãra a can.
arabic: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُنَّتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ فِي عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falam yaku yanfaʿuhum īmānuhum lammā ra-aw basanā sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat fī ʿibādihi wakhasira hunālika al-kāfirūna
